Class EventBus

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Utils.EventBus.EventBus
public class EventBus extends Object

  • Constructor Details

    • EventBus

      public EventBus(UUID uuid)
      Constructs an EventBus instance with the specified unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      uuid - the unique identifier for this EventBus instance

  • Method Details

    • register

      public void register(UpdateListener listener)
      Registers an UpdateListener to receive updates. If the listener is already registered, it will not be added again.
      Parameters:
      listener - the UpdateListener to be registered

    • endGame

      public void endGame() throws Exception
      Ends the game session and notifies all registered listeners to disconnect. This method iterates through all registered UpdateListener instances and invokes their disconnectAll method with the specified UUID. It ensures thread safety by making the method synchronized.
      Throws:
      Exception - if any of the listeners encounter an error while disconnecting.

    • notifyError

      public void notifyError() throws Exception
      Notifies all registered UpdateListener instances about an error event. This method iterates over the list of listeners and invokes the onError method on each listener, passing the unique identifier uuid.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the notification process.

    • updateGameCreated

      public void updateGameCreated(int level, List<Deck> ShowableDecks, ArrayList<Player> players, int hourglassResting, int surrenderTime) throws Exception
      Notifies all registered listeners that a game has been created with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      level - the difficulty level of the created game
      ShowableDecks - the list of decks that can be shown during the game
      players - the list of players participating in the game
      hourglassResting - the resting duration for the hourglass in the game
      surrenderTime - the allotted time for surrendering in the game
      Throws:
      Exception - if any error occurs during the listener update

    • depositThingInHand

      public void depositThingInHand(String playerNickname) throws Exception
      Facilitates the action of depositing the item currently held by a player into the system. This method notifies all registered update listeners about the deposit action.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player performing the deposit action
      Throws:
      Exception - if any issues occur during the deposit process or notification of listeners

    • pickTileLMR

      public void pickTileLMR(int TileIndex, String playerNickname) throws Exception
      Handles the selection of a tile in a game by a player, notifying all registered update listeners about the action.
      Parameters:
      TileIndex - The index of the tile being selected by the player.
      playerNickname - The nickname of the player selecting the tile.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while notifying update listeners.

    • insertTileLMR

      public void insertTileLMR(int TileIndex, int r, int c, int rotation, String playerNickname) throws Exception
      Inserts a tile into the game at the specified location and orientation, associated with a player's action.
      Parameters:
      TileIndex - The index of the tile to be inserted.
      r - The row where the tile is to be placed.
      c - The column where the tile is to be placed.
      rotation - The rotation of the tile to be applied (e.g., 0, 90, 180, 270 degrees).
      playerNickname - The nickname of the player performing the action.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the insertion process.

    • pickLittleDeckLMR

      public void pickLittleDeckLMR(int deckIndex, String playerNickname) throws Exception
      Communicates the action of picking a little deck by a specified player to all update listeners.
      Parameters:
      deckIndex - The index of the deck being picked.
      playerNickname - The nickname of the player picking the deck.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the operation.

    • addAlienOrHumansLMR

      public void addAlienOrHumansLMR(String playerNickname, boolean wantAlien, AlienColor alienColor, int row, int column) throws Exception
      Adds a request to place an alien or human on the game board at the specified location. This method is synchronized to ensure thread safety during updates.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player making the request
      wantAlien - a boolean indicating if the player wants to place an alien (true) or a human (false)
      alienColor - the color of the alien to be placed; ignored if placing a human
      row - the row index where the alien or human is to be placed
      column - the column index where the alien or human is to be placed
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an error processing the request

    • setPlayerPosInFlightBoard

      public void setPlayerPosInFlightBoard(String playerNickname, int pos) throws Exception
      Updates the position of a player in the flight board and notifies all registered listeners with the player's updated position.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player whose position is to be updated
      pos - the new position of the player on the flight board
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the update process

    • endbuilding

      public void endbuilding(String playerNickname, int positionwheretogo) throws Exception
      Ends the building process for a specified player and directs them to a specified position.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player ending the building process
      positionwheretogo - the position where the player should be directed after ending the building
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an issue ending the building process

    • endBuildingPhaseForAll

      public void endBuildingPhaseForAll() throws Exception
      Ends the building phase for all registered listeners. This method iterates over the collection of listeners and invokes their respective endBuildingPhaseForAll method, passing the unique identifier (UUID) as a parameter. This method is synchronized to ensure thread safety during the iteration and invocation of listener methods.
      Throws:
      Exception - if any of the listener methods throw an exception during execution

    • sendPenalty

      public void sendPenalty(int penalty, String type) throws Exception
      Sends a penalty to all registered listeners with the specified parameters. This method is synchronized to ensure thread safety during execution.
      Parameters:
      penalty - the penalty amount or code to be sent to the listeners
      type - the type or category of the penalty to be sent
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while sending the penalty to a listener

    • abandonedShipTakenActivate

      public void abandonedShipTakenActivate(Player player, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> posPers) throws Exception
      Activates the abandoned ship taken event and notifies all registered listeners.
      Parameters:
      player - The player involved in the event.
      posPers - A 2D list representing positions and other related data for the event.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the activation process.

    • updateCardUse

      public void updateCardUse(Card card) throws Exception
      Updates the use of the specified card by notifying all registered update listeners.
      Parameters:
      card - the card object to be updated
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while updating the card

    • updateCardUseSTATE

      public void updateCardUseSTATE(ArrayList<Player> ps, c_State STATO) throws Exception
      Updates the card use state by notifying all registered listeners. The method is synchronized to prevent concurrent modifications when multiple threads update the state.
      Parameters:
      ps - the list of players involved in the update
      STATO - the current state to be applied
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the update process

    • updateStatus

      public void updateStatus(stateEnum stato) throws Exception
      Updates the status by notifying all registered listeners with the provided state and UUID. The method ensures thread safety by synchronizing the operation.
      Parameters:
      stato - the new state to be set and communicated to the listeners
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the operation of any registered listener

    • updateFinalScores

      public void updateFinalScores(HashMap<String,Float> finalScores) throws Exception
      Updates the final scores by notifying all registered listeners with the provided scores. This method is synchronized to ensure thread safety.
      Parameters:
      finalScores - a HashMap containing the final scores where the key is a String representing an identifier and the value is a Float representing the score.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the notification of listeners.

    • chooseAbandonedStationActivate

      public void chooseAbandonedStationActivate(Player player, FlightBoard flightBoard, boolean yOn, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> storagetiles, ArrayList<ArrayList<Goods>> newgoods) throws Exception
      Activates the abandoned station for the specified player and updates the necessary game components.
      Parameters:
      player - the player attempting to activate the abandoned station
      flightBoard - the flight board representing the current state of the game
      yOn - a boolean flag indicating specific activation conditions
      storagetiles - a 2D list containing the storage tiles related to the game
      newgoods - a 2D list containing updated goods to be incorporated during activation
      Throws:
      Exception - if any error occurs during the activation process

    • updateAssertBatteriesPos

      public void updateAssertBatteriesPos(Player p, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> posBatAndNumBattXPos) throws Exception
      Updates the positions of batteries for a specified player and notifies all listeners about this update with the provided data.
      Parameters:
      p - The player for whom the battery positions are being updated.
      posBatAndNumBattXPos - A nested list containing battery position data and the number of batteries for a specific position.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the update process.

    • updateAddGoods

      public void updateAddGoods(Player player, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> posGoods, ArrayList<ArrayList<Goods>> goodsSets) throws Exception
      Updates and notifies listeners about the addition of goods to a player's inventory. This method is synchronized to ensure thread safety and consistency during updates.
      Parameters:
      player - The player whose inventory is being updated.
      posGoods - A list of position goods, where each sublist contains details about the positions and related integers for the goods.
      goodsSets - A list of goods sets, where each sublist contains the goods to be added or updated in the player's inventory.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the update process, such as issues with notifying listeners.

    • updateChoosePassengersToLose

      public void updateChoosePassengersToLose(Player player, Consequences c, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> pass) throws Exception
      Notifies all registered update listeners to handle the process of choosing passengers to lose.
      Parameters:
      player - the player object representing the entity making the decision.
      c - the consequences object that contains the outcomes related to the decision.
      pass - a nested list of integers representing the passengers affected by the decision.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while notifying the update listeners.

    • planetFinStatActivate

      public void planetFinStatActivate(ArrayList<Player> playersss, FlightBoard flightBoard) throws Exception
      Activates the planet financial status and notifies all registered listeners.
      Parameters:
      playersss - the list of players involved in the operation
      flightBoard - the flight board instance associated with the operation
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the activation process

    • updateConsequenceLostDays

      public void updateConsequenceLostDays(Player player, FlightBoard flightBoard, int numDays, Boolean t) throws Exception
      Updates the consequence of lost days associated with a player and a flight board. This method notifies all registered update listeners about the change.
      Parameters:
      player - The player for whom the consequence of lost days needs to be updated.
      flightBoard - The flight board associated with the specified player.
      numDays - The number of days to be updated as lost.
      t - A flag indicating the specific state or condition of the update.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while notifying update listeners.

    • updateLooseAllGoods

      public void updateLooseAllGoods(Player player, Boolean finished, Boolean batttoloose, Boolean allbatlost) throws Exception
      Updates the loose state of all goods for the given player. This method notifies all registered listeners about the update.
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose goods' state needs to be updated
      finished - indicates if the process triggering this update is finished
      batttoloose - indicates if the battle is lost and goods are to be affected
      allbatlost - indicates if all battles are lost for the given context
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while updating or notifying listeners
